title: MCU vs. DCU w/ Kris Anka - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 274)
description:
Spider-Man Across the Spider-Verse Character Designer Kris Anka joins the boys to talk Suits, suits, and whether we believe more in the future of the MCU or DCU.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - WHO talks about aspartame
00:10:30 - We address Nick’s Suit issue
00:19:20 - Barbie or Oppenheimer?
00:25:00 - Making Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
00:48:15 - ADS
00:53:00 - What would you choose to the MCU vs new DCU
01:25:00 - Secret Invasion
